plot outline: Vinayaka Chavithi is a 1957 Indian Telugu film, directed by Samudrala Raghavacharya and produced by Samudrala Raghavacharya The film stars NTR, Balakrishna and Jamuna in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ghantasala.
title: Vinayaka Chaviti
plot: Vinayaka Chavithi is a 1957 Indian Telugu film, directed by Samudrala Raghavacharya and produced by Samudrala Raghavacharya The film stars NTR, Balakrishna and Jamuna in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ghantasala.
